en: As the project becomes more and more "official," you start to feel a little sad. This has been your baby for so long, and now that all the feedback is adding up, it feels a bit less like you.
Then a new idea occurs to you - why not include an easter egg?
You put in an easter egg - an inside joke between you and Takashi. You doubt anyone will find such a silly note, but it does make you happy.
No, no. There's actual work that you need to do - you shouldn't be goofing off.
